alert.note: Alert for Goshen (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 7:33PM MDT until June 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN GOSHEN COUNTY... At 732 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Veteran to near Yoder to near Hawk Springs to 7 miles northwest of Hawk Springs Recreation Area to 9 miles west of Hawk Springs Campground, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Yoder, Huntley, Veteran and Hawk Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
